thread.title: Golembiewski jumped from Fayette County to major college football
thread.title_full: Golembiewski jumped from Fayette County to major college football

author: George Von Benko For the Herald-Standard
title: Golembiewski jumped from Fayette County to major college football
text:
Golembiewski finished football career at WVU 
Submitted Photo 
Brownsville grad Ted Golembiewski is shown during his playing days at West Virginia University. Posted: Monday, October 19, 2015 12:00 am Golembiewski jumped from Fayette County to major college football By George Von Benko For the Herald-Standard Herald-Standard | 0 comments 
Back in the day Fayette County was a fertile recruiting ground for college football teams.
